newsitem.title: USA: Everest Medical secures $1 mln credit line.
newsitem.headline: Everest Medical secures $1 mln credit line.

text.p: Everest Medical Corp said Monday it has established a $1 million line of credit with Riverside Bank, Minn. to be used for working capital needs.
The prime rate line of credit, secured by a private investor, is available to the company through March 1999. The investor was not identified.

"We believe this credit facility represents the most effective vehicle to provide for the company's working capital requirements as we pursue our threefold goal of increasing market share in our core business of laparoscopy products, creating a market presence in minimally invasive cardiac surgery and achieving profitability," said John Shannon Jr, Everest Medical's president and chief executive officer, in a statement.
Everest Medical designs, makes and markets bipolar electrosurgery instruments for minimally invasive surgery markets.
